    • メソッドの詳細

      • decode

        protected void decode(io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerContext p_decode_1_,
                      io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf p_decode_2_,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.Object> p_decode_3_)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        クラスからコピーされた説明: io.netty.handler.codec.ByteToMessageDecoder
        Decode the from one ByteBuf to an other. This method will be called till either the input ByteBuf has nothing to read when return from this method or till nothing was read from the input ByteBuf.
        定義:
        decode クラス内 io.netty.handler.codec.ByteToMessageDecoder
        パラメータ:
        p_decode_1_ - the ChannelHandlerContext which this ByteToMessageDecoder belongs to
        p_decode_2_ - the ByteBuf from which to read data
        p_decode_3_ - the List to which decoded messages should be added
        例外:
        java.lang.Exception - is thrown if an error occurs

      • setCompressionThreshold

        public void setCompressionThreshold(int thresholdIn)
